item.dc:creator: @ipkyouhaha ipkyouhaha
item.description:
@ipkyouhaha wrote:

try deleting something you recently added. if you used a tut, just follow it backwords, deleting everything you added. most likely you added something wrong or put it in the wrong spot.

item.title: I have an error, only for some experianced people... Try it out if you dare
item.dc:creator: @CryptoScape CryptoScape
item.description:
@CryptoScape wrote:

[quote=“Mod Mopar, post:2, topic:9104”]Bumping is against the rules … :mad:[/quote]you STFU !

[quote=“Saradomin, post:1, topic:9104”]Well, this may be an error for experianced people. This error probably includes my other files, and not the client. When I compile. I get this error:

[glow=red,1,000]Exception in thread “main” java.land.NoSuchFieldError: workingDir
at ItemHandler.ItemHandler.java:33
at server.mainserver.java:28[/glow]

Please help me, this error is after “Starting ScapeName Server on 0.0.0.0:43594” - This error lets me log in, but gets stuck at the black loading screen.[br][size=1]Posted at: August 11, 2006, 11:55:52 PM[/size][hr]I found workingDir if it helps any of you… Here is what it looks like in ItemHandler.java:

[quote author=Saradomin link=topic=12968.msg146618#msg146618 date=1155355049]
ItemHandler() {
for (int i = 0; i < MaxDropItems; i++) {
ResetItem(i);
}
for (int i = 0; i < MaxListedItems; i++) {
ItemList[i] = null;
}
loadItemList(server.workingDir + “item.cfg”);
loadDrops(server.workingDir + “drops.cfg”);
}
[/quote][br][size=1]Posted at: August 11, 2006, 11:57:29 PM[/size][hr]Bump[/quote]
and for you i dont think it got something to do whit youre itemhandler i think you meesed up one of the spaces in you’re item.cfg like when you make a case whit spaces you get this problem

spaces

case

Read full topic

item.title: I have an error, only for some experianced people... Try it out if you dare
item.dc:creator: @Saradomin Saradomin
item.description:
@Saradomin wrote:

Well, this may be an error for experianced people. This error probably includes my other files, and not the client. When I compile. I get this error:

[glow=red,1,000]Exception in thread “main” java.land.NoSuchFieldError: workingDir
at ItemHandler.ItemHandler.java:33
at server.mainserver.java:28[/glow]

Please help me, this error is after “Starting ScapeName Server on 0.0.0.0:43594” - This error lets me log in, but gets stuck at the black loading screen.[br][size=1]Posted at: August 11, 2006, 11:55:52 PM[/size][hr]I found workingDir if it helps any of you… Here is what it looks like in ItemHandler.java:

[quote=“Saradomin”]ItemHandler() {
for (int i = 0; i < MaxDropItems; i++) {
ResetItem(i);
}
for (int i = 0; i < MaxListedItems; i++) {
ItemList[i] = null;
}
loadItemList(server.workingDir + “item.cfg”);
loadDrops(server.workingDir + “drops.cfg”);
}[/quote][br][size=1]Posted at: August 11, 2006, 11:57:29 PM[/size][hr]Bump
